  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    com.arangodb.entity.AqlExecutionExplainEntity
    for removal, use ArangoDatabase.explainAqlQuery(String, Map, ExplainAqlQueryOptions) instead
    com.arangodb.model.AqlQueryExplainOptions
    for removal, use ArangoDatabase.explainAqlQuery(String, Map, ExplainAqlQueryOptions) instead
    com.arangodb.model.EdgeCollectionDropOptions
    use EdgeCollectionRemoveOptions instead
    com.arangodb.model.FulltextIndexOptions
    since ArangoDB 3.10, use ArangoSearch or Inverted indexes instead.
    com.arangodb.model.VertexCollectionDropOptions
    use VertexCollectionRemoveOptions instead
    com.arangodb.model.ZKDIndexOptions
    since ArangoDB 3.12, use MDIndexOptions instead.
  • Deprecated Enums
    Enum
    Description
    com.arangodb.entity.CollectionStatus
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    com.arangodb.ArangoCollection.ensureFulltextIndex(Iterable<String>, FulltextIndexOptions)
    since ArangoDB 3.10, use ArangoSearch or Inverted indexes instead.
    com.arangodb.ArangoCollection.ensureZKDIndex(Iterable<String>, ZKDIndexOptions)
    since ArangoDB 3.12, use ArangoCollection.ensureMDIndex(Iterable, MDIndexOptions) or ArangoCollection.ensureMDPrefixedIndex(Iterable, MDPrefixedIndexOptions) instead.
    com.arangodb.ArangoCollectionAsync.ensureFulltextIndex(Iterable<String>, FulltextIndexOptions)
    com.arangodb.ArangoCollectionAsync.ensureZKDIndex(Iterable<String>, ZKDIndexOptions)
    since ArangoDB 3.12, use ArangoCollectionAsync.ensureMDIndex(Iterable, MDIndexOptions) or ArangoCollectionAsync.ensureMDPrefixedIndex(Iterable, MDPrefixedIndexOptions) instead.
    com.arangodb.ArangoDatabase.explainAqlQuery(String, Map<String, Object>, AqlQueryExplainOptions)
    for removal, use ArangoDatabase.explainAqlQuery(String, Map, ExplainAqlQueryOptions) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoDatabase.explainQuery(String, Map<String, Object>, AqlQueryExplainOptions)
    for removal, use ArangoDatabase.explainAqlQuery(String, Map, AqlQueryExplainOptions) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoDatabaseAsync.explainAqlQuery(String, Map<String, Object>, AqlQueryExplainOptions)
    for removal, use ArangoDatabaseAsync.explainAqlQuery(String, Map, ExplainAqlQueryOptions) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoDatabaseAsync.explainQuery(String, Map<String, Object>, AqlQueryExplainOptions)
    for removal, use ArangoDatabaseAsync.explainAqlQuery(String, Map, AqlQueryExplainOptions) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.Builder.asyncExecutor(Executor)
    for removal. To consume the responses in a custom executor use async CompletableFuture methods.
    com.arangodb.ArangoEdgeCollection.drop()
    use ArangoEdgeCollection.remove() instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoEdgeCollection.drop(EdgeCollectionDropOptions)
    use ArangoEdgeCollection.remove(EdgeCollectionRemoveOptions) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoEdgeCollectionAsync.drop()
    use ArangoEdgeCollectionAsync.remove() instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoEdgeCollectionAsync.drop(EdgeCollectionDropOptions)
    use ArangoEdgeCollectionAsync.remove(EdgeCollectionRemoveOptions) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoVertexCollection.drop()
    use ArangoVertexCollection.remove() instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoVertexCollection.drop(VertexCollectionDropOptions)
    use ArangoVertexCollection.remove(VertexCollectionRemoveOptions) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoVertexCollectionAsync.drop()
    use ArangoVertexCollectionAsync.remove() instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoVertexCollectionAsync.drop(VertexCollectionDropOptions)
    use ArangoVertexCollectionAsync.remove(VertexCollectionRemoveOptions) instead
    com.arangodb.entity.arangosearch.PrimarySort.getFieldName()
    for removal, use PrimarySort.getField() instead
    com.arangodb.entity.CollectionEntity.getStatus()
    com.arangodb.internal.ArangoCollectionAsyncImpl.ensureFulltextIndex(Iterable<String>, FulltextIndexOptions)
    com.arangodb.internal.ArangoCollectionImpl.ensureFulltextIndex(Iterable<String>, FulltextIndexOptions)
    com.arangodb.internal.ArangoEdgeCollectionAsyncImpl.drop()
    com.arangodb.internal.ArangoEdgeCollectionAsyncImpl.drop(EdgeCollectionDropOptions)
    com.arangodb.internal.ArangoEdgeCollectionImpl.drop()
    com.arangodb.internal.ArangoEdgeCollectionImpl.drop(EdgeCollectionDropOptions)
    com.arangodb.internal.ArangoVertexCollectionAsyncImpl.drop()
    com.arangodb.internal.ArangoVertexCollectionAsyncImpl.drop(VertexCollectionDropOptions)
    com.arangodb.internal.ArangoVertexCollectionImpl.drop()
    com.arangodb.internal.ArangoVertexCollectionImpl.drop(VertexCollectionDropOptions)
    com.arangodb.internal.InternalArangoCollection.createFulltextIndexRequest(Iterable<String>, FulltextIndexOptions)
    com.arangodb.internal.InternalArangoEdgeCollection.removeEdgeDefinitionRequest(EdgeCollectionDropOptions)
    com.arangodb.internal.InternalArangoVertexCollection.dropRequest(VertexCollectionDropOptions)
    com.arangodb.internal.net.ProtocolProvider.createConnectionFactory()
    use ProtocolProvider.createConnectionFactory(ProtocolConfig) instead
    com.arangodb.model.AqlQueryOptions.getMaxPlans()
    for removal, use AqlQueryOptions.getMaxNumberOfPlans() instead
    com.arangodb.model.AqlQueryOptions.maxPlans(Integer)
    for removal, use AqlQueryOptions.maxNumberOfPlans(Integer) instead
    com.arangodb.model.AqlQueryOptions.Options.getMaxPlans()
    for removal, use AqlQueryOptions.Options.getMaxNumberOfPlans() instead
    com.arangodb.model.arangosearch.ArangoSearchCreateOptions.getPrimarySorts()
    for removal, use ArangoSearchCreateOptions.getPrimarySort() instead
    com.arangodb.model.OptionsBuilder.build(FulltextIndexOptions, Iterable<String>)
  • Deprecated Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    com.arangodb.ArangoDBException(String, Throwable)
    use ArangoDBException.of(String, Throwable) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoDBException(Throwable)
    use ArangoDBException.of(java.lang.Throwable) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoDBException(Throwable, long)
    use ArangoDBException.of(Throwable, Long) instead
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    com.arangodb.entity.arangosearch.ConsolidationType.BYTES_ACCUM
    The “bytes_accum” policy type is deprecated and remains in ArangoSearch for backwards compatibility with the older versions. Please make sure to always use the “tier” policy instead.
    com.arangodb.entity.IndexType.fulltext
    since ArangoDB 3.10, use ArangoSearch or Inverted indexes instead.
